class kernel

Detailed Description

Input manager class.

This class is used together with the kernel. The kernel of x2d is forwarding screen-space touch and acceleration input from hardware to the input manager and the input manager is applying all required transformations and sends the calculated world-space touches back to the kernel which in turn sends them to any subscribed objects.
